feed.title: CTV activation meeting on IRC - Thursday 18 December 17:00 UTC

entry.title: CTV activation meeting on IRC - Thursday 18 December 17:00 UTC
entry.summary: Next week, a meeting will be organized to deliberate on the activation parameters for BIP 119. Participants are encouraged to familiarize themselves with the related pull requests, various activation methods, and previous meeting logs to contribute effectively to the discussion. The meeting will take place in the IRC Channel: ctv-csfs-activation on libera.chat. The agenda includes discussing the activation parameters and constructing an activation client for BIP 119, known colloquially as "the /dev/fd0 floppy disk guy". This meeting is relevant to members of the Bitcoin Development Mailing List group, as indicated by the receipt of this notification.
